author: "Stockar, Johann, fl. 1538"
title: "Empirica, sive medicamenta varia, experientia diuturna comprobata et stabilita, contra plerosque omnes corporis humani morbos, tam internos, quam externos ... / in duos libros distributa ... primum inventa ... a D. Joanne Stockero ... in lucem edita, oper"
imprint: "Francoforti: Typis Melchioris Hartmanni, impensis Nicolai Bassai, 1601"
